languages.text: Кажется... тени на мостике смеются над вашим решением. Только вы их слышите?

traits.locale_text: Кажется... тени на мостике смеются над вашим решением. Только вы их слышите?

languages.text: It seems... the shadows on the bridge are laughing at your decision. Are you the only one who can hear them?
languages.original_text: Кажется... тени на мостике смеются над вашим решением. Только вы их слышите?

traits.locale_text: It looks like... the shadows on the bridge are laughing at your decision. Are you the only one who can hear them?
It looks like... the shadows on the bridge are laughing at your decision. Are you the only one who can hear them?
It seems... the shadows on the bridge are laughing at your decision. Are you the only one who can hear them?
It seems... the shadows on the bridge are laughing at your decision. Are you the only one who can hear them?
It seems... the shadows on the bridge are laughing at your decision. Are you the only one who can hear them?
It seems... the shadows on the bridge are laughing at your decision. Are you the only one who can hear them?

languages.text: 看来……舰桥上的阴影正在嘲笑你所做的决定。只有你能听到它们的声音吗？
languages.original_text: It seems... the shadows on the bridge are laughing at your decision. Are you the only one who can hear them?

traits.locale_text: 看来……舰桥上的阴影正在嘲笑你所做的决定。只有你能听到它们的声音吗？

languages.text: Parece que... las sombras del puente se ríen de tu decisión. ¿Las ve alguien más, o solo tú?
languages.original_text: It seems... the shadows on the bridge are laughing at your decision. Are you the only one who can hear them?

traits.locale_text: Parece que... las sombras del puente se ríen de tu decisión. ¿Las ve alguien más, o solo tú?

languages.text: 艦橋の上の影に、決意を笑いものにされているようだが…。他の人々には声が聞こえていないのか？
languages.original_text: It seems... the shadows on the bridge are laughing at your decision. Are you the only one who can hear them?

traits.locale_text: 艦橋の上の影に、決意を笑いものにされているようだが…。他の人々には声が聞こえていないのか？

languages.text: Es scheint ... als würden die Schatten auf der Brücke über deine Entscheidung lachen. Hört sie etwa niemand außer dir?
languages.original_text: It seems... the shadows on the bridge are laughing at your decision. Are you the only one who can hear them?

traits.locale_text: Es scheint ... als würden die Schatten auf der Brücke über deine Entscheidung lachen. Hört sie etwa niemand außer dir?

languages.text: Vous avez l'impression... que les ombres sur le pont se moquent de votre décision. Êtes-vous {mf|le seul|la seule} à pouvoir les entendre ?
languages.original_text: It seems... the shadows on the bridge are laughing at your decision. Are you the only one who can hear them?

traits.locale_text: Vous avez l'impression... que les ombres sur le pont se moquent de votre décision. Êtes-vous {mf|le seul|la seule} à pouvoir les entendre ?

languages.text: Anlaşılan... Köprüdeki gölgeler, kararına gülüyor. Onları başka duyan var mı ki?
languages.original_text: It seems... the shadows on the bridge are laughing at your decision. Are you the only one who can hear them?
